message.entry: Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
The length of ''BinEdges'' must be one longer than ''BinCounts'' when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
''BinCounts'' is not supported if any of ''NumBins'',''BinWidth'', ''BinMethod'', or ''BinLimits'' is specified, and it must have length equal to length(BinEdges)-1.
When data to distribute among bins is {0}, bin edges must be {0}.
When data to distribute among bins is {0}, ''BinLimits'' value must be {0}.
''Normalization'' values ''countdensity'' and ''pdf'' are not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration.
''BinMethod'' value ''integers'' not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration.
''BinMethod'' value ''{0}'' is not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration.
Specify ''BinCounts'' parameter when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Specify ''BinEdges'' or ''BinLimits'' parameter when ''BinLimitsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Bin edges must be a vector of length at least 2.
New value for ''Data'' must match data type of old value.
''FaceColor'' value must be ''none'' when ''DisplayStyle'' value is ''stairs''.
''BinMethod'' value ''manual'' is not supported.
''BinWidth'' value must be a positive finite scalar.
{0} input is not a valid color.
Bin edges must be a datetime vector of length at least 2 if the data to distribute among bins is datetime.
''BinLimits'' value must be a sorted finite {0} vector of length at least 2 when data to distribute among bins is {0}.
''BinWidth'' value must be a duration or calendarDuration scalar when data to distribute among bins is datetime.
''BinWidth'' value must be a duration scalar when data to distribute among bins is duration.
Bin edges must be a duration vector of length at least 2 if the data to distribute among bins is duration.
''BinEdges'' parameter must not be followed by any of ''NumBins'',''BinWidth'', ''BinMethod'', or ''BinLimits''.
Bin edges must be a row vector with {0,number,integer} elements when bin counts has {1,number,integer} elements.
''BinCounts'' parameter is not supported when data to distribute among bins is specified.
'BinCounts'' parameter is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''auto''.
''BinEdges'' and ''BinLimits'' parameters are not supported when ''BinLimitsMode'' value is ''auto''.
Bin edges must be numeric when data to distribute among bins is numeric.
''BinWidth'' value must be numeric when data to distribute among bins is numeric.
''BinLimits'' value must be numeric when data to distribute among bins is numeric.
''BinMethod'' value must be ''auto'', ''scott'', ''fd'', ''integers'', ''sqrt'', or ''sturges'' when data to distribute among bins is numeric.
''Orientation'' parameter is not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration and when there are non-histogram objects in the axes.
''Orientation'' parameter is not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration and multiple y-axes are present.
{0} parameter is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Bin edges must be a sorted datetime vector that does not contain NaTs.
Bin edges must be a sorted duration vector that does not contain NaNs.
''{0}'' is not a supported bin method when data to distribute among bins is {1}.
''Categories'' parameter is not supported when data to distribute among bins is numeric or logical.
''Normalization'' value ''{0}'' is not supported when data to distribute among bins is datetime or duration.
{0} function is not supported when ''BinCountsMode'' value is ''manual''.
Horizontal orientation of bars is not supported for histogram in polar coordinates.
Invalid bin edges for histogram in polar coordinates. Difference between maximum and minimum values must not be greater than 2*pi.
Invalid 'BinLimits' value for histogram in polar coordinates. Specify a 2-element vector of values that differ by no more than 2*pi.
Orientation of box charts
Relative width of individual boxes
Outlier marker displacement
Median comparison display
Number of bins
Binning algorithm
Width of bins
Histogram display style
Toggle summary display of data for undisplayed categories
Orientation of bars
Bin edges
Value
